property.name: label
property.label: Label
property.description: Label for the search input field.

property.name: placeholder
property.label: Placeholder
property.description: Placeholder text displayed when input is empty.

property.name: hintText
property.label: Hint text
property.description: Additional hint text displayed below the label.

property.name: searchObjects
property.label: Search objects
property.description: Comma-separated list of Salesforce object API names to search (e.g., Knowledge__kav,Account,Contact).

property.name: maxSuggestions
property.label: Max suggestions
property.description: Maximum number of autocomplete suggestions to display.

property.name: debounceMs
property.label: Debounce (ms)
property.description: Delay in milliseconds before triggering search after user stops typing.

property.name: minChars
property.label: Minimum characters
property.description: Minimum number of characters required before search triggers.

property.name: noResultsText
property.label: No results text
property.description: Text displayed when no search results are found.

property.name: searchResultsPage
property.label: Search results page
property.description: URL path for the full search results page. The search term will be appended as a 'q' query parameter.

property.name: navigateOnSelect
property.label: Navigate on select
property.description: When enabled, selecting a suggestion navigates to that record.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied to the search container.
